mapper.select: SELECT pay.payment_date, p.title, p.price, s.amount, sh.num AS shipping_state, p.product_num, s.num AS sales_num, pr.num AS project_num FROM payment pay JOIN sales s ON pay.payment_num = s.payment_num JOIN product p ON s.product_num = p.product_num JOIN Shipping sh ON sh.num = pay.shipping_state JOIN ProjectRequest pr ON p.num = pr.num WHERE pay.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
